channel.title: My first post
channel.description:
Hello moparscapers im livo Seeing as that i am new to this i would like to ask, you knowhow u can show what people have said before like saying quote by: ... then it has a date and it is in a light blue box!
how do i do that? your sincerely livo (chaoslance-x)

item.title: My first post
item.dc:creator: @chaoslance-x chaoslance-x
item.description:
@chaoslance-x wrote:

Thank you so much
Yours Sicnerely
livo (chaoslance-x)

Read full topic

item.title: My first post
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Hi livo

The quote button is in the top right corner of the post, ie below is what happens when I click Quote for your post:

[quote=“chaoslance-x, post:1, topic:287013”]Hello moparscapers im livo
Seeing as that i am new to this i would like to ask, you knowhow u can show what people have said before like saying quote by: … then it has a date and it is in a light blue box!

how do i do that?
your sincerely
livo (chaoslance-x)[/quote]
